column4: anybody here happen to know where i could find epcam-src-0.7.1.tar.gz ?
search packages.ubuntu.com
or install apt-file and man apt-file
or use google if you're not looking for an ubuntu package
it's not an offical file
well then, it's not officially supported....use google like the rest of us
i can't find it through google. i was hoping somebody here might still have it
what is it? a driver or something?
yeah, for some cheap webcam thingie i'm trying
huh
sorry, i'm useless
as mentioned here http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=118623
yeah, i just pulled that up
well...you could try posting to that forum and ask people where they got the driver
http://members.chello.nl/~j.vreeken/se401/ that's a start...but i don't know where the original source is....are you sure it's not in the kernel?
pretty sure
from that website...it looks like you download the patch and patch it against a kernel program to get the cameras to work
and the waybackmachine hasn't got it either, yeah but it's a bit of a hassle, i'll give it a try
well, the patches are on that site i gave you, and then patch it against something in the kernel source it looks like
making progress, it already compiles :) tnx for the effort you put into helping me
